t:
I don't know what hit me, but one day I woke up and found myself strapped to a chair. From then, every day was the same; I was strapped and tortured psychologically every day. I started behaving like a madman, wishing to be rescued.

Then one-day things changed, my captor unstrapped me. This was the moment I was waiting for, he never got a chance. I forced him on the chair and strapped him, he never protested. What a fool to let me free.

I took whatever I could find and started beating him up, but he just smiled. Oh, what a psycho, I thought. But I was happy, even more, cause I could hear police sirens approaching.

The men in uniform rushed in; as they put me in handcuffs and rescued my captor, everything started falling in place. Why he unstrapped me, why he was laughing and how the police found this location.
c:
The bruises on his body really helped with the case against me.



#kidnap #torture #reversed #beating #police #misunderstanding #planned #psycho
